Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory77.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Familiar Construct', 3: 'Whoa... So she ended up in our squad, huh...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Leader', 3: 'Ah. So this is the redheaded Death—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Familiar Construct', 3: "Wait, Boss, you'd better not—", 4: '2'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Before the Squadron Leader can finish his sentence, Vera has already kicked him down to the ground and pressed a knife to his throat.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Don\'t call me "Death".', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Leader', 3: 'You—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Familiar Construct', 3: "Wait! Boss, just forget it... I was sent to the detention room last time because of this. We don't want the people up there to get upset at us again.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Leader', 3: 'Tch. Fine.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The leader gently moves Vera's knife out of the way and lets his members help him up."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Leader', 3: 'This unexpected situation in our squad aside...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Leader', 3: 'Our mission objective is to retreat safely from this city. Do what you can, everyone.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "We're not defending the city but retreating from it? What about the civilians living here?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Leader', 3: 'Due to all the sudden occurrences, we do not have sufficient time nor manpower for evacuations.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Take everything we need and abandon the people... Is that what the orders are?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Familiar Construct', 3: '...Yes.', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'What are they even thinking? There are at least thousands of civilians here not yet evacuated. Besides, we have defense facilities here at the ready. If we employ them well—', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Leader', 3: 'Even if we do that, this place is gone for good!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "This location is an important hub. If we abandon this place, we'll be abandoning all the connected battlefronts and losing ground.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Vera suddenly remembers the info she heard from the first squad she was in: the combat headquarters will be moving to outer space.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'They probably want all the resources here because... they need them for certain preparations...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Leader', 3: "I'm not sure where you got the info, but that's basically what the headquarters wants.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "So those who are left behind... those who can't evacuate...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Construct Leader', 3: '...Will all be sacrificed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "...If we could guide most of the Corrupted to a certain spot... we'd be able to buy some more time so that more can be evacuated.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Familiar Construct', 3: 'Hey, wait!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After a brief pause, Vera turns around and hastens to the door. The Construct whom she got into a fight with grabs her by the arm.'}
{2: 'Familiar Construct', 3: "You're seeking death by doing this!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I'm doing this to end my pain.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Vera simply meets the other's questioning look with a gaze of steely determination. Shaking off the other Construct, she picks up her blades."}
